title: Extra lives in keen 5, level 1
content:
How on earth do you get to the 9 extra lives on the first level of keen 5? I just started playing through all the keen games again recently, and this is driving me nuts.

Sorry if the answer is already posted, I looked for it for about 20 minutes and couldn't find it.

title: lives!
content:
Hint #1: You'll have to think "outside the box."

Hint #2: The Sneakplat has the right idea.

Hint #3: Guns that shoot down don't hurt you when they aren't firing.

title: Re: lives!
content:
F10 + Y is a great help, you'll have to go right to the top of the level, so high in fact you won't be visible and walk right across from right to left.[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v499/Nevad/menbun.gif[/img]

Awww! Feel the love!

title: hmm
content: Well, i can make it into the little passage right past the gun now, but then i just seem to be stuck inside the wall.  I cant see my character, and I've been jumping and pogoing around for about 10m but I cant find any way out.

title: Re: hmm
content: If I remember correctly, which I might not be, you have to go into fly mode and then float up and to the right.  Otherwise, you'll just be trapped.

title: Re: hmm
content:
Pogo to the right, then when you're at your highest, unpogo and you'll climb up to above the screen. That's how I always did it anyway (before I even knew of the cheats).____________
Don't think of me as an ordinary man.

Even though I am an ordinary man.

Ah, [url=http://DaVince.sitesled.com/]site.[/url]

title: Re: hmm
content: Yeah I remember that worked pretty well when I was a kid and always playing on easy [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-oldy.gif[/img] . But I haven't once succeeded in getting on that platform when playing normal or hard.

title: Re: hmm
content:
He's right you know, it can be real difficult, someone make the poor guy a video link?[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v499/Nevad/menbun.gif[/img]

Awww! Feel the love!

title: done
content: I finally managed it, you have to impossible pogo trick it to make it work.  Video link wouldn't help much since your character is hidden behind a wall [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]
